title: Intensive One Day: Fix and Flip Workshop
desc:
The SIX F's of FIX & FLIPS? 
 PLUS ?How YOU can begin Now 
 
 We are very excited to have ?Mr. Darren Davis ? with us for our Fall Workshop in November! ?Come to our Real Estate Intensive and find out some of the secrets to Fixing and Flipping properties.? 
 Over the past five ?years? Darren Davis ?and his partner? Kendall Stock , have formulated a system for finding, fixing and flipping properties in the Southern California County of Riverside, that has generated over $2,200,000 in income for themselves and their investors. ?They have bought and sold close to 100 properties during a time when most people were losing property, not buying it... And they did it with none of their own money! ? 
 
 
 What you can expect to learn at this event: 
 
 
 The 6 F's of Fix & Flip 
 
 
 Property Analysis 
 
 
 How YOU can start NOW with no money or credit! 
 
 
 And much more! 
 
 
 
 Darren Davis is an experienced real estate investor, business owner and instructor for the premier Real Estate Investing Education system in the nation! ?The man absolutely knows what he is talking about when it come to flipping property.... YOU will definitely want to BE THERE! 
 
 Learn To Invest In Real Estate from the Best!
